project_abstract.cdata: The Fourth Technical Cooperation Project aims to provide continued support to China in its economic and structural reform effort. The project consists of two components. The first component supports reform and institutional development. It supports strengthening the institutions involved in the Government's economic policies based on Government priorities, provides support to programs associated with policy reform; and strengthens the capacity of provincial finance bureaus and project implementing agencies to manage implementation of Bank and non-Bank financed projects involved in fostering sustainable development. The second component supports pre-investment and project preparation. It finances consultants' services, training, and equipment required for the preparation of feasibility studies. Subprojects under the first component include institutional strengthening of Chinese academic institutes and government agencies, demonstration zones, and finance bureaus. The second component includes subprojects concerned with sustainable forestry, water conservation, flood control, water supply, agricultural development, and river basin pollution.

P042299.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第四技术合作信贷项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目旨在持续支持中国开展经济改革及结构性改革工作。本项目设有两个子项目，第一个子项目支持改革和机构能力建设，即支持增强根据政府工作重点参与制定经济政策的机构的能力，向政策改革相关方案提供支持，增强省级财政厅局和项目实施机构的能力，以便其管理世行及非世行资助旨在促进可持续发展的项目；第二个子项目支持项目前期准备工作，具体资助编制可研报告所需的咨询服务、培训和设备。第一个子项目的内容包括增强中国学术机构和政府机构、示范区以及财政厅局的能力；第二个子项目的内容包括林业可持续发展、节水、防洪、供水、农业发展及流域污染治理。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
